about_the_game:
We're so excited to announce that the demo for Rapid Soccer is out! Have an awesome time blasting the goals in!

Hopefully, this demo will give you a glimpse of the fun you can have with this great football simulator. Do let us know what you think. We can't wait to hear your feedback!

The demo involves challenges with a leaderboard so you can see how your soccer skills compare with other players.

This release is just a simple proof of concepts so many features won't be available yet like career mode, national/international competitions, and so on. But rest assured that all of this will be implemented in due course.
detailed_description:

Hopefully, this demo will give you a glimpse of the fun you can have with this great football simulator. Do let us know what you think. We can't wait to hear your feedback!

The demo involves challenges with a leaderboard so you can see how your soccer skills compare with other players.

This release is just a simple proof of concepts so many features won't be available yet like career mode, national/international competitions, and so on. But rest assured that all of this will be implemented in due course.
name: Rapid Soccer Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 or equivalent
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4770 or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: This demo will give you a glimpse of the fun you can have with this great football simulator. Do let us know what you think. We can't wait to hear your feedback! The demo involves challenges with a leaderboard so you can see how your soccer skills compare with other players.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese
